snippet: Molycorp, a mine operator, acquires Neo Material for $1.3 billion, in the latest deal in a consolidating industry.
abstract: Molycorp, rare earth metal mining operator, acquires rare earth processing firm Neo Material Technologies for $1.3 billion; it is the latest in a series of deals that are rapidly consolidating the industry.
lead_paragraph: Molycorp, a mine operator, acquires Neo Material for $1.3 billion, in the latest deal in a consolidating industry.

headline.seo: Merger Combines a Rare Earth Mining Firm With a Processor
headline.main: Molycorp, a Rare Earth Mining Firm, Is to Merge With a Processor, Neo Material
headline.print_headline: Molycorp, a Rare Earth Mining Firm, Is to Merge With a Processor, Neo Material
